NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlFlags* GetDeserializationFlags (   ) 
 

Gets the XML Flags that were passed to the ReadXml() function that is currently being executed. This function would typically be called by the GisXmlSaxHandler callbacks.

Returns:
Returns the XML Flags
